revised_title: Iodine and Bromine in Mineral Waters: A Geological and Chemical Analysis
tldr: This article discusses the discovery of iodine and bromine in certain mineral waters of South Britain. The author, Charles Daubeny, examines various springs and analyzes the saline ingredients, including the proportions of iodine and bromine. The findings contribute to the understanding of the distribution of these elements in mineral waters and their potential medicinal properties.
